attributes.action: Make parliament action an independent inquiry into the response to corona virus.
attributes.additional_details: Set up an independent inquiry, in to response to the pandemic, policy's, and advice given to public, and at the end of this compare our response to other governments around the world and learn from mistakes made.
attributes.background: Set up an independent inquiry into the goverment response to the corona virus, to learn from mistakes made and to identify any gross negligence.
